name: federalization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of including something in a federal system (= one that consists of a group of regions that are controlled by a central government): Numerous options were considered for the country at the end of the war, including federalisation. For right-wing politicians in the US, any policy that might be seen as federalization of the health care system would be unacceptable.
More examplesFewer examplesThe federalisation of this group of workers would generate a lot of complaints.They have proposed federalization of a greater number of criminal offences.
